医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，数百万患有轻度认知障碍的美国人未被诊断出来对于许多人来说，忘记带钥匙或难以计划任务似乎是衰老过程中的正常现象。但这些失误实际上可能是更严重的症状：轻度认知障碍（MCI），这可能是阿尔茨海默病的早期症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Millions-of-Americans-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-undiagnosed-studies-find.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Millions-of-Americans-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-are-undiagnosed-studies-find.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=836b702d-509e-42cc-9a53-299e3727edcc Wed, 25 Oct 2023 10:56:48 -0400 Millions of Americans with mild cognitive impairment are undiagnosed, studies find
新的智能手机附件可以为所有人提供低成本的神经系统筛查加州大学圣地亚哥分校的工程师开发了一种智能手机附件，可以让人们以低成本筛查各种神经系统疾病，例如阿尔茨海默病和创伤性脑损伤，而且无论肤色如何，都能准确筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/New-smartphone-attachment-could-enable-low-cost-neurological-screening-for-all.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/New-smartphone-attachment-could-enable-low-cost-neurological-screening-for-all.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913b5cd3-b2b1-409f-b0f8-bb6db1fb5e8a Wed, 25 Oct 2023 10:06:29 -0400 New smartphone attachment could enable low-cost neurological screening for all
加州扩大带薪病假并提高卫生工作者工资随着州长加文·纽瑟姆签署了扩大带薪病假、增加流产丧假以及提高卫生工作者工资的法案，加州继续提升其作为卫生政策进步州的声誉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/California-expands-paid-sick-days-and-boosts-health-worker-wages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/California-expands-paid-sick-days-and-boosts-health-worker-wages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb1824e6-4b1d-48aa-b1a7-215ef5133408 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 07:27:00 -0400 California expands paid sick days and boosts health worker wages
Sphere Fluidics 的扩展和愿景在本次采访中，Sphere Fluidics 运营副总裁 Rob Trainor 坐下来进行了一次富有洞察力的对话，详细介绍了 Sphere Fluidics 最先进的新设施的完成情况以及办公室搬迁和品牌重塑背后的战略决策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Sphere-Fluidics-Expansion-and-Vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Sphere-Fluidics-Expansion-and-Vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c77ff5d2-de42-4ddd-9b4d-d543f075e455 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 07:06:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics' Expansion and Vision
Omicron 的优势：助推器迫使 SARS-CoV-2 适应和进化疫苗加强剂量对病毒适应性进化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Omicrons-edge-boosters-Pressure-SARS-CoV-2-to-adapt-and-evolve.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Omicrons-edge-boosters-Pressure-SARS-CoV-2-to-adapt-and-evolve.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b14986a-6218-43e0-8479-484e7c8d73c3 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 06:59:00 -0400 Omicron's edge: boosters pressure SARS-CoV-2 to adapt and evolve

英国生物银行揭示：地中海饮食可能是对抗32种慢性病的关键！社区居住成年人健康饮食模式与 48 种慢性疾病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/UK-Biobank-reveals-Mediterranean-diet-might-be-the-key-to-combating-32-chronic-diseases!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/UK-Biobank-reveals-Mediterranean-diet-might-be-the-key-to-combating-32-chronic-diseases!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461c7846-4434-463b-b351-896cee2e1c1b Wed, 25 Oct 2023 05:45:00 -0400 UK Biobank reveals: Mediterranean diet might be the key to combating 32 chronic diseases!
痴呆症和胆固醇：调查激素替代疗法的联系和影响激素替代疗法（HRT）、血清胆固醇水平和痴呆症发病率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Dementia-and-cholesterol-investigating-links-and-impacts-of-hormone-replacement-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Dementia-and-cholesterol-investigating-links-and-impacts-of-hormone-replacement-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36850655-af63-4f6d-8304-4ca3ee5d042d Wed, 25 Oct 2023 05:14:00 -0400 Dementia and cholesterol: investigating links and impacts of hormone replacement therapy

ChatGPT 能否彻底改变营养教育？研究探讨潜力和挑战ChatGPT 作为营养领域知识增强工具的应用潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Can-ChatGPT-revolutionize-nutrition-education-Study-examines-pottial-and-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Can-ChatGPT-revolutionize-nutrition-education-Study-examines-pottial-and-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b93ddd8e-329a-468f-b00a-7b117d9a7a83 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 04:10:00 -0400 Can ChatGPT revolutionize nutrition education?
